articles.description: These are the mini-LED, MicroLED, OLED and QD-OLED TVs to watch in 2022
articles.content: It can feel, at times, like there's a new TV hitting store shelves every single week. While we can promise you that isn't the case (sadly they mostly all drop at the same time in March and/or April),… [+7993 chars]

articles.content: Tim Duffy, who designs and outfits home theaters and other high-end home entertainment systems for clients in Southern California, has this 85 Sony in his living room, and praises Sonys overall fit, … [+468 chars]
